title: Australia's coral wonderland (A)
creator_credit: Noel Monkman, Kelly Monkman and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: A picture of the life along the Great Barrier Reef; an aboriginal corroboree; flora and fauna on a trip down the Russell River; micro-photographs of animal life; underwater cinematography of an octopus, sea worms, a feathered star fish, a king schnapper, hermit crabs, sea anemones and other forms of life; scenes of turtles building nests and laying eggs; hatching of young turtles. Commentary by Wilfrid Thomas; sound by Mervyn Murphy and photography by Noel Monkman FRMS.
creator_credit_for_label: Noel Monkman, Kelly Monkman and Australian National Film Board
